text: (Napiye! Nir avarkalai nokki) mekattiliruntu malaiyai poliyac ceypavan yar? Ataik kontu iranta pumiyai uyirppippavan yar? Enru nir avarkalaik ketpirayin atarkavarkal ‘‘niccayamaka allahtan'' enru kuruvarkal. Atarku, ‘‘pukal anaittum allahvukke!'' Enru nir kuruviraka. Eninum, avarkalil perumpalanavarkal (itai) unarntu kolvatillai
